description: Students are introduced to a number of compositional techniques and are given opportunities to create original works of music and hear them performed. The course also includes listening to important 20th and 21st-century works and discussing current trends in music, the changing role of the composer in society, and practical composition issues. Prerequisites: Music 112, 114, or permission of instructor. Generally offered every semester.
name: Composition I
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Music 112, 114, or permission of instructor. Generally offered every semester.
